articles.title: Chelsea takeover close as Roman Abramovich lawyers 'find legal resolution to stumbling block' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The developments comes just 24 hours after the takeover had been plunged into fresh doubt over the oligarch's alleged 'refusal to agree' to a proposed sale structure.
